name: deimosrising
text: A comment left by deimosrising was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by choosebro, TacoBock, VictoriaW)

name: jhunt
text: I dunno, Ray kind of makes alcoholism look rad.  All getting business done while on his drink.

name: mr_pete
text: Beef intervenes because he would want someone to do likewise to him.

name: philosophe
text: Known as projection .

name: magb
text: If Ray has it it's because it's rad, and if it's rad it's because Ray has it.

name: vonpokemon
text: A comment left by vonpokemon was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by hellofyellin, mattbeetee, GMM, mortshire, Courtland, Zippyllama, Xerol, Prine, ZedPower, TheSoulBear, Cicadalek)

name: hellofyellin
text: It is NOT rad.

name: zapatos
text: A comment left by zapatos was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by smallgods, heccibiggs, Mnemon, miaou)

name: craigola
text: My dad thinks it's rad. We don't really speak.

name: gmm
text: Craigola's working some rough chuckles these days

name: pberard
text: He's trying to get inside your head, you know?

name: patkun
text:
You think he's just giving Ray sass...but then you look at his face, and see nothing but concern for his best friend's wellbeing.
Achewood can be so damn touching.

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "We are not sure if it is a problem."

name: evolume
text: I DO.

name: nyu
text: In college its called being awesome. At any other time it is called be an alcoholic.

name: sexualhomeboy
text: There is a time and a place for everything, and it's called "College".

name: aarongstock
text: "Or do you agree that it is [not] okay"

name: wharfrat
text: so sad

name: rowboat
text: I know everyone has their own personal Achewood moment - "this is the strip that got me hooked," or "changed me," or blah blah blah. Well, this was mine. The end.

name: thequietyou
text: I would love a program that controls my drinking...right now I use "wife."

name: zapatos
text: I use passing out.

name: gussiejives
text: I tried coding my brother's drinking.  It didn't end well.

name: justa
text: Beef only asks because he cares.

name: dovey
text:
You know what, this'd probably be a 5 if it weren't for the last panel being repeatedly quoted or paraphrased on almost every single strip since Assetbar's inception.

Jus' sayin.

name: fineoakstructure
text: Do you think it is rad to have negativism dovey

name: theoddwaffle
text: Well played, fineoakstructure. Well played.

name: greenkoolayd
text: i would have used the phrase, 'a stick up your ass', as opposed to 'negativity', but i can be untoward at times.

name: mikeronomicon
text: In my understanding the difference between a drunk and an alcoholic is that alcoholics go to meetings. I don't think Ray's parties fit the AA bill anyway. All such as hell of crispy Stellas and Kettle One. According to my best friend who is a massive drunk, to be a drunk you must be so drunk that on at least one occasion you took a leak in a dresser drawer. I don't know how true that is, but thank god I have never been that drunk.

name: micrphonist
text: Yes Roast Beef, I do.

name: fidget
text: It IS rad to have alcoholism!

name: jhunter
text: Hemingway had alcoholism. Hemingway was rad. Ergo, it is rad to have alcoholism. Squid toe roe.

name: benhead
text: Really, Beef is the one who should be drinking on the job here.
